test_fwi
Fire Weather Index Sample Input Data Set
Description
This data set is the sample input data that was used in original FWI program calibration.
Usage
test_fwi
Format
A data frame containing 9 columns and 49 rows, with 1 header line
Source
http://cfs.nrcan.gc.ca/pubwarehouse/pdfs/19973.pdf
References
1. Van Wagner, CE. and T.L. Pickett. 1985. Equations and FORTRAN program for the Canadian
Forest Fire Weather Index System. Can. For. Serv., Ottawa, Ont. For. Tech. Rep. 33. 18 p.44
